name: Retrieve Channel Usage for valid CIF Key with Registration Number having logged into Application

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930460120000"

When I fetch the Channel Utilisation Details for CIF Key <cifKey>:
| cifKey |
| 0100000930460120000 |

Then the Registration Number should be set to "55383607" and the following Channel Utilisation values should be returned
| channel | usedInlast6Months | lastUsedDate | usedInlast6MonthsField | lastUsedDateField |
| internetBanking | false | null | internetBankingUsed | lastUsedInternetBankinge |
| mobileBanking | false | null | mobileBankingUsed | lastUsedMobileBanking |
| tabletBanking | false | null | tabletBankingUsed | lastUsedTabletBanking |
| phoneBanking | false | null | phoneBankingUsed | lastUsedPhoneBanking |
| branchBanking | false | null | branchBankingUsed | lastUsedBranchBanking |
| kioskBanking | false | null | kioskBankingUsed | lastUsedKioskBanking |
| iDDCredit | false | null | iDDCreditUsed | lastUsedIDDCredit |
| atm | false | null | atmUsed | lastUsedATM |
| pointOfSale | false | null | pointOfSaleUsed | lastUsedPOS |
| anPost | false | null | anPostUsed | lastUsedAnPost |
| smallBusinessIntenetBanking | false | null | smallBusinessIntenetBankingUsed | lastUsed24hrSIBIB |
| internetBusinessBanking | false | null | internetBusinessBankingUsed | ibbLastLogon |

userStory.storyName: Retrieve the Channel Utilisation - Intenet/Phone/Mobile/Tablet etc - information for a customer

title: Retrieve Channel Usage for valid CIF Key with Registration Number having logged into Application
